summary.span: 表示一个可以返回值的异步操作。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous operation that can return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的表示单个操作通常返回一个值，并以异步方式执行。The class represents a single operation that returns a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 对象是一种的中心组件[基于任务的异步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)首次在.NET Framework 4 中引入。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 由于由执行工作对象通常以异步方式执行线程池线程上而不是以同步方式主应用程序线程，因此你可以使用属性，以及， ，和属性，以确定任务的状态。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 通常情况下，lambda 表达式用于指定的任务是执行的工作。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 实例可能会创建各种不同的方式。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 最常用的方法，即从开始提供[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，是调用静态或方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 这些方法提供了一种简单的方法启动任务，通过使用默认值，而无需获取其他参数。These methods provide a simple way to start a task by using default values and without acquiring additional parameters. 下面的示例使用方法以启动循环，然后显示的循环迭代数的任务：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/run1.vb#6)] 一种替代方法，并启动任务的最常见方法[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，是调用静态或方法。An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 属性返回对象，与属性返回对象。The property returns a object, and the property returns a object. 重载其`StartNew`方法允许你将自变量传递、 定义任务创建选项，并指定任务计划程序。Overloads of their `StartNew` method let you pass arguments, define task creation options, and specify a task scheduler. 下面的示例使用方法启动任务来。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它在功能上等效于在前面的示例代码。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 有关更完整示例，请参阅[基于任务的异步编程](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). 类还提供了构造函数对任务进行初始化，但的未计划的执行。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 出于性能原因，和`Task.Factory.StartNew`方法是对创建和计划计算的任务的首选的机制，但任务创建和计划必须分开的情况下，可能使用构造函数，与任务的方法然后可能用于计划在以后执行的任务。For performance reasons, the and `Task.Factory.StartNew` methods are the preferred mechanisms for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where task creation and scheduling must be separated, the constructors may be used, and the task's method may then be used to schedule the task for execution at a later time. 从桌面应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，创建和调用任务的线程的区域性将成为线程的上下文的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是说，无论当前区域性执行该任务时的线程，任务的当前区域性为调用线程的区域性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 对于面向.NET Framework，之前版本的应用， [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，任务的区域性为执行该任务时的线程的区域性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. 请注意，应用商店应用程序单击下面的 Windows 运行时中设置和获取的默认区域性。Note that Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. 对于不返回值的操作，你使用类。For operations that do not return a value, you use the class. 如果你正在开发与 C# 7，是值类型，而不是引用类型的更轻量任务使用结构; 从 C# 7 开始支持它。If you're developing with C# 7, for a more lightweight task that is a value type rather than a reference type, use the structure; it is supported starting with C# 7.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是最常见的方法调用此构造函数来实例化对象并启动任务是通过调用静态和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 此构造函数提供的唯一好处是它允许对象实例化分离，从而可从任务调用。The only advantage offered by this constructor is that it allows object instantiation to be separated from task invocation. ## Examples 下面的示例计算表示已发布的丛书的文本文件中单词的大致数目。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每个任务负责打开的文件，以异步方式读取其整个内容并通过使用正则表达式计算字数统计。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 调用方法以确保显示到控制台的每本书的字数前已完成所有任务。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. 在此示例中的对象执行被分隔对象实例化，以便该示例可以确保每个文件存在。Object instantiation is separated from object execution in this example so that the example can ensure that each file exists. 如果没有，它会显示缺失的文件的名称。If they do not, it displays the name of the missing file. 否则，它会调用方法来启动每个任务。Otherwise, it calls the method to launch each task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run3.vb#2)] 正则表达式模式`\p{P}*\s+`匹配零个、 一个或多个标点字符后跟一个或多个空白字符。The regular expression pattern `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more whitespace characters. 它假定匹配项的总数等于近似字数统计。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将不会计划执行直到当前的任务已完成，无论是由于运行到成功完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或由于被取消的原因提前退出。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个使用选筛的埃拉托色尼斯来计算质数介于 1 和用户输入的值之间的先行任务。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 一个数组，用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示的数字，并且该元素的值将指示该数字是否复合 (其值是`true`) 或质数 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 然后，此任务被传递到延续任务，它负责从整数数组中提取质数并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue2.vb#2)]

A new continuation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将不会计划执行当前的任务已完成，直到是否由于运行到成功完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或提前退出由于被取消而完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个任务，介于 2 和 20 之间传递一个整数，并将返回一个数组，包含前 10 个指数 (从 n1到 n10) 的数。The following example creates a task that is passed an integer between 2 and 20 and returns an array that contains the first ten exponents (from n1 to n10) of that number. 然后，延续任务负责显示指数。A continuation task is then responsible for displaying the exponents. 在前面的任务和原始编号前面的任务生成其指数传递此消息。It is passed both the antecedent and the original number whose exponents the antecedent generates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将不会计划执行当前的任务已完成，直到是否由于运行到成功完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或提前退出由于被取消而完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个使用选筛的埃拉托色尼斯来计算质数介于 1 和用户输入的值之间的先行任务。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 一个数组，用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示的数字，并且该元素的值将指示该数字是否复合 (其值是`true`) 或质数 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 然后，此任务被传递到延续任务，它负责从整数数组中提取质数并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. 取消标记传递到前面的任务和延续任务。A cancellation token is passed to both the antecedent and the continuation task. A对象用于定义 100 毫秒的超时值。A object is used to define a timeout value of 100 milliseconds. 如果事件将激发，方法被调用，并且取消标记用于请求取消的任务。If the event fires, the method is called, and the cancellation token is used to request cancellation of the tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue1.vb#1)] 通常情况下，提供大约 100,000 值导致超时间隔过期和事件触发，请求和取消请求要设置。Typically, supplying a value of about 100,000 causes the timeout interval to expire and the event to fire, and the cancellation request to be set.

summary.span: 提供对用于创建和配置 实例的工厂方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to factory methods for creating and configuring instances.

value.span: 一个工厂对象，可创建多种 对象。

span.span: A factory object that can create a variety of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的默认实例等同于通过调用的无参数创建的类构造函数。This property returns a default instance of the class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless constructor. 它具有以下属性值：It has the following property values: |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`或 `null`, or | 此属性的最常见用途是创建并启动新任务以一次对方法。The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、方法提供的最简单的方法来创建默认配置值的对象。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a object with default configuration values. 下面的示例使用静态属性以使的三个调用方法。The following example uses the static property to make three calls to the method. 首次启动`Task`对象，该执行返回 1 的 lambda 表达式对象。The first starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that returns 1. 在第二个开始`Task`对象，执行实例化一个新的 lambda 表达式`Test`实例。The second starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that instantiates a new `Test` instance. 在第三个开始`Task`对象，该枚举 C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ 目录中的文件对象。The third starts a `Task` object, which enumerates the files in the C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ directory. （请注意，该示例成功执行需要该目录存在，并且它包含的文件。(Note that successful execution of the example requires that the directory exist and that it contain files. remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问该属性的 get 访问器阻止调用线程，直到异步操作已完成;它等效于调用方法。Accessing the property's get accessor blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete; it is equivalent to calling the method. 可用的操作的结果后，它存储并在随后调用立即返回属性。Once the result of an operation is available, it is stored and is returned immediately on subsequent calls to the property. 请注意，如果该任务，在操作期间出现异常或任务已被取消，属性不返回值。Note that, if an exception occurred during the operation of the task, or if the task has been cancelled, the property does not return a value. 相反，尝试访问属性值都将引发异常。Instead, attempting to access the property value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例是命令行实用工具，用于计算作为命令行自变量传递其名称，则每个目录中的文件中的字节数。The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument. 如果该目录包含文件，它将执行实例化的 lambda 表达式目录中每个文件的对象和检索的值其属性。If the directory contains files, it executes a lambda expression that instantiates a object for each file in the directory and retrieves the value of its property. 如果目录不包含的任何文件，它只需调用方法创建的任务其属性为零 (0)。If a directory contains no files, it simply calls the method to create a task whose property is zero (0). 当任务完成时，是从可用的目录的所有文件中的字节总数属性。When the tasks finish, the total number of bytes in all a directory's files is available from the property.
